Index.meta_title: Lotusfire - Learn English effortlessly in your daily reading.
Index.meta_description: A browser app to help you learn English by reading Chinese content, providing automatic translations and curated bilingual articles.

Hero.title: Immerse yourself gradually in English
Hero.description: 不出國也可以英文無所不在。點擊英文單字顯示中文翻譯，自動推薦單字學習。

Features.section_description: 隨時隨地學習英語，不再害怕全英文
Features.feature1_title: 不再害怕全英文 - Gradual introduction of words
Features.feature1_description: 點一下英文單字馬上出現中文翻譯 + 聽發音。
Features.feature2_title: 邊滑手機邊收集單字 - Keep using your device as is
Features.feature2_description: 閱讀中文內容時自動推薦適當程度的單字，無時無刻都是學習的機會。
Features.feature3_title: 精選雙語內容 - Curated bilingual vocab sets
Features.feature3_description: 每日根據你挑選的主題推薦最新中英文文章。
Features.feature4_title: 專屬單字庫 - Dedicated vocab reviewer
Features.feature4_description: 珍藏你收集的單字，隨時搜尋、複習、瀏覽。
Features.feature_description: 通過精選文章和推薦的單字來學習英語。Learn English through curated articles and vocabulary suggestions.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Best Plan for Your English Learning
Pricing.section_description: 免費使用所有基本功能，提供更多進階方案供選擇。 Access all basic features for free, with advanced plans available.

PricingPlan.enterprise_plan_description: The best value for your time
PricingPlan.next_renew_date: 您的訂閱將於 {date} 續訂 / Your subscription renews on {date}

FAQ.question: 什麼是 Lotusfire？ What is Lotusfire?
FAQ.answer: Lotusfire 是一款專為學習英語而設計的免費瀏覽器應用程式，可以讓你在閱讀中文時學習英文。 / Lotusfire is a browser app designed to help you learn English while reading Chinese content.

CTA.title: 準備好了嗎? Are you ready?
CTA.description: 現在就開始收藏單字，支援 iPhone、iPad 與 Android! Start collecting vocabulary now, available for iPhone, iPad, and Android.

Footer.terms_of_service: 服務條款 - Terms Of Service

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: 您沒有執行此操作的權限 / You do not have the permissions to perform this action

SignIn.meta_description: 通過我們用戶友好的登錄流程無縫登入您的帳戶。 / Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: 通過我們直觀的註冊流程輕鬆創建一個帳戶。 / Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Billing.title_bar_description: 管理您的帳單和訂閱 / Manage your billing and subscription
Billing.current_section_description: 調整您的付款計劃以最佳符合需求 / Adjust your payment plan to best suit your requirements

Todos.title_bar_description: 查看和管理您的待辦清單 / View and manage your todo list

AddTodo.title_bar: 添加待辦事項 / Add Todo
AddTodo.add_todo_section_title: 創建新的待辦事項 / Create a new todo
AddTodo.add_todo_section_description: 填寫下面的表格以創建新的待辦 / Fill in the form below to create a new todo

EditTodo.edit_todo_section_title: 修改待辦事項 / Modify todo
EditTodo.edit_todo_section_description: 填寫下面的表格以編輯待辦 / Fill in the form below to edit the todo

UserProfile.title_bar_description: 查看和管理您的用戶資料 / View and manage your user profile

OrganizationProfile.title_bar_description: 管理您的組織 / Manage your organization

CheckoutConfirmation.message_state_button: 返回帳單 / Go back to Billing
